p: Our client is a leading company in the capital markets and is continuing to build its future on a foundation of collaboration, dedication, and openness; A fully automated trading firm based in NYC.
p.2: They are looking for an experienced and highly motivated Algo Engineer. There are a number of different sub-teams for the engineer to join which would be decided at the offer stage. p.4: You will be working in a fast-paced and dynamic team environment where you will apply rigorous statistical analysis to vast quantities of the market and financial data to produce predictive trading models. Running models live on high-performance trading infrastructure and analyse daily performance to maintain ongoing profitability.
